item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Sports Haven

And now for something completely different......

Sports Haven is our local off-track betting establishment, but it is also the only New Haven bar with an aquarium, pool tables, wings, cheap beer, and the largest assortment of T.V.s in the city. The place consists of a bar surrounding an aquarium that at one point supposedly held a shark (rumor has it he died), but still hosts quite a collection of fish and other aquatic creatures. In addition, there are at least 4 pool tables to play on, a cafe with a large selection of wings and pizza. And of course, lots of televisions brodcasting every horse and dog race from around the country.

Happy Hour drink specials run until 7pm:
$2 draft beer
$2.50 well drinks


Your contact is: Jeanie (860) 942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
